vsParam:
Lord Rod, Verbena.
It's been so long.

Oh, you guys. Ho ho, is everything going well
with your alchemy journey, [px]?

Umâ€” It's supposed to go well...
But we've got a problem.

A problem... What kind of problem?
We'll try our best to support you if you need anything.

We really appreciate it.
Do you... know the "Meteor Butterfly"?

Yes. It's a kind of beautiful butterfly which can
produce the "Scale of Stars"... if I recall it right.

In fact, we happen to need the "Scale of Stars".
So could you two please enlighten us...

Hmm...
I've never seen that in my life...

The "Scale of Stars" has been sought after
ever since the "Meteor Butterfly" went extinct...

Huh, we're hopeless... What do we do?

In the Undersea Shrine, there's a small courtyard
with various creatures living there.

...! So it means,
there may be living "Meteor Butterflies"!?

Yeah, but that's only a possibility.
Maybe you can go to Amaryllis for her advice?

Yeah, we're going to!
Thanks, you two!

It's no big deal.
I hope you could find... the "Scale of Stars".
